## Dependencies.install() method

Install dependencies

Signature:

```typescript
install(dependencies: {
        name: string;
        version: string;
    }[]): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter    | Type                                   | Description                      |
| ------------ | -------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- |
| dependencies | { name: string; version: string; }\[\] | Array of dependencies to install |

Returns:

Promise&lt;void&gt;
